title: San Diego/La Jolla
name: Westfield UTC
directions: just east of La Jolla, in University City
hours: M-F 10AM-9PM, Sa 10AM-8PM, Su 11AM-7PM (''individual store hours vary'')
content: An outdoor shopping mall located just outside of La Jolla, in the University City area. Basically anything you'd find in your average suburban shopping mall with the addition of an ice skating rink, called '''[http://www.icetown.com/ Ice Town]'''.
